name: Mrs. Charles S. Fairchild
biography: Mrs. Helen Lincklean Fairchild was the wife of Charles S. Fairchild, Secretary of the Treasury under Grover Cleveland and a leader on Wall Street. She was a political figure in her own right, serving as president of the New York State Association Opposed to Suffrage; one of her vice presidents was Miss Eleanor G. Hewitt.
biography_75_words: Mrs. Helen Lincklean Fairchild was the wife of Charles S. Fairchild, Secretary of the Treasury under Grover Cleveland and a leader on Wall Street. She was a political figure in her own right, serving as president of the New York State Association Opposed to Suffrage; one of her vice presidents was Miss Eleanor G. Hewitt.
